casebody.data:
Birge, Respondent, v. Berlin Iron Bridge Co. et al., Appellants. (.Supreme Court, General Term, Third Department. March 15, 1892.) Action by James C. Birge against the Berlin Iron Bridge Company and others.

Argued before Mayham, P. J., and Herrick, J.

Ho opinion. Motion to change the order entered upon previous decision of general term granted. See 16 N. Y. Sunp. 596. See, also, 15 N. Y. Supp. 969; 17 N. Y. Supp. 684, 946.
